::Killfest/EndBringer::

Killfest nods, taking out his EMP rifle and getting it ready. A missile 
launcher slides out of his shoulder, and his optics charge for firing.

"Is Astrotrain going to be fighting alongside or waiting to pick us 
up?" He asks, standing up.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Standing behind Killfest, EndBringer was always ready for battle. The 
huge bot's four tentacles were sparking as electricity sped through 
them.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster looks to Killfest, then he starts to speak "head in straight,
> they will never expect a frontal assault" he says confidentally.
